ask_set_password: Would you like to set a password?
sure_delete_wallet: Are you sure want to close the wallet?
incorrect_data: The server is offline. Your wallet's data might be incorrect.
want_create_seed: Do you want to create a new seed phrase, or restore a wallet using an existing seed phrase?
please_save_words: Please save these 12 words on paper (order is important!). This seed phrase will allow you to recover your wallet in case of computer failure.
enter_seed: Please enter your seed phrase in order to restore your wallet.
your_phrase_is_important:
Your seed phrase is important! If you lose your seed phrase, your money will be permanently lost.
To make sure that you have properly saved your seed phrase, please retype it here.
password_changed_success: Your password has been successfully changed
more_than_ten_wallets: You can not create more than 10 wallets
never_type: Never type it on a website
your_seed_is: Your wallet generation seed phrase is
about_text:
Emercoin Secure Wallet is an easy-to-use and lightweight crypto wallet based on the Electrum protocol. It currently supports two cryptocurrencies, Emercoin and Bitcoin, stored together in the same wallet.

The wallet is:
Secure, with private keys stored on the users device and the wallet itself is protected with a seed phrase, and
Lightweight, because it does not keep a local copy of the blockchain.

You can also use the wallet with your own Electrum servers.

Emercoin Secure Wallet is available for smartphones, tablets and desktop computers. You can use the same wallet on several devices at once.
